newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: HBG unit Interbeton wins Indonesian orders.
newsitem.headline: HBG unit Interbeton wins Indonesian orders.

text.p: Construction firm Hollandsche Beton Groep NV (HBG) said on Wednesday its subsidiary Interbeton had won Indonesian orders worth a total of 110 million guilders.
HBG said in a statement Interbeton's Indonesian unit Decorient had landed a total of three orders.
One of these consists of building a factory for Barbie dolls for P.T. Mattel Indonesia near the Indonesian capital Jakarta, which will be ready at the end of 1997.
Decorient will also build a brewery for Multi Bintang Indonesia, the country's largest brewer which is majority-owned by Dutch Heineken, near the city of Surabaya.
Together with Indonesian construction group PT Total Bangun Persada, Decorient has started building a complex in Jakarta comprising a parking garage, apartments, shops and a hotel.
